altTitles.en: 缶乃短編集 無職とJK

description.en:
From the title work "Unemployed and JK" to the valuable coterie manuscript, all the works are "girls"!  
In addition to recording the entire story of the title work "Unemployed and JK" serialized in the Yuri anthology "Eclair" series  
"That's what that girl wants" that depicts the shape of unforgivable love, the story of pseudo-sisters "Even if the life of a flower is short".  
From one-shot works published by other companies to douujinshi works, and even for this book  
A must-have Yuri romance short story collection for Canno fans, including newly drawn episodes of "Unemployed and JK" !!   
  
(Google translate)
